text_logic_form: The triangle $XYZ$ is an isosceles triangle.
Find the length of the line $XY$.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The triangle $XYZ$ is an isosceles triangle.
Find the length of the line $XY$.
diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $YX$ is $2x + 3$.
The length of the line $XZ$ is $8x - 4$.
The length of the line $YZ$ is $4x - 1$.
The length of the line $YZ$ is equal to the length of the line $YX$.
line_instances: There are lines $YX$, $YZ$, and $XZ$, forming the triangle $XYZ$.
